message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I think $75 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we say $85?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $80?
